title: Clinet has gone crazy!!!
body: Basically since the worlds update on the client it has started being crazy slow. Like I will click on the store for it to take 5-10 mins to load it. Or it will timeout my ban because it won't let me click on a champion and then i will get timed out. Also lately don't know if its related but it seems to effect my browser to when i go full screen on a video my task bar will flicker at the bottom, and its not even supposed to be showing during a full screen vid. Please any help you can give would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
It sounds like there are a few different issues here, but I'm not sure the recent patch has a role in it. Your long load times in the store and issues in champ select sound like a pretty unstable connection to the servers. As for your fullscreen issue, does this happen in the League client?

For your connection issue specifically, I'd like you to ensure your local network settings are A-Okay, so I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step. Let me know if those steps helped.

Well last thing I had happen was I got a RADS error and i looked up a few vids for help and they had me change a few things with the IP v4 settings and that seemed to fix it. Before that I uninstalled the client and reinstalled it which didn't help. As far as my connection Im using a direct connection via Ethernet from my gateway so idk whats caused the issue?

Sounds you have the same problem I do.. Check to see if our symptoms match

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ewAGq5Xv-game-is-taking-up-1-2-mbps-dedicated-yet-running-very-slowly-freezing-disconnecting-glitching

Some of those things are happening but I don't seem to be having the same errors popping up. A few times I have had the your network is connected error and the game wont load back in after crashing although my network is running fine.
Did you try all the steps in the connection guide, and if so, did you notice any changes in your issue?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PLPwVP8J,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2016-09-26T15:02:31.118+0000)
>
> Did you try all the steps in the connection guide, and if so, did you notice any changes in your issue?

Went through entire "Connection guide steps" and nothing has fixed this issue. It is only happening with the client and when the client is running. It effects my browser when the client is running as well. the most annoying thing is that the task bar flickers when the game goes full screen when it shouldn't even be showing.

I think at this point, we'll need to take a look at some system logs in order to investigate further. I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) If you attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), it will expedite the troubleshooting process. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

I seem to have found the solution to my issue, i opened my settings to my graphics card, and Intel and notice my refresh rate was 48 hrz, i changed it to 60 and now everything seems to be running fine, not sure why this solved it or why it was set to 48 in the first place but it worked!

My League Client is also being extremely slow. I thought at first it was just my computer but I'm running minecraft, Fallout, World of Warcraft, and a lot of other games completely fine. It's also only the client, where chat lags, clicks take a few seconds to register, and interacting at all with the window has such a delayed reaction that when i clicked the ready check trying to get into a game it never registered. In game I had fps and lag issues until I lowered the graphics settings.
